transcript:
deal with them all! It's quite astonish- ing. How did you get things settled? I couldn't possibly do it." 
"Ah, my love," answered Anna Mikhaylovna, "God grant you never know what it is to be left a widow without means and with a son you love to distraction! One learns many things then," she added with a certain pride. "That lawsuit taught me much. When I want to see one of those big people I write a note: 'Prin- cess So-and-So desires an interview with So- and-So,' and then I take a cab and go
